biocontainers.name: jass
biocontainers.summary: Computation of joint statistics over sets of GWAS results

biotools.summary: software package that handles the computation of the joint statistics over sets of selected GWAS results, and the interactive exploration of the results through a web interface.

bioschemas.name: JASS
bioschemas.summary: software package that handles the computation of the joint statistics over sets of selected GWAS results, and the interactive exploration of the results through a web interface.
